## ðŸ” Admin Authentication Flow:
1. **Admin Login** â†’ Submit admin credentials and get admin access_token
2. **Get Dashboard** â†’ View comprehensive system statistics
3. **Access Admin Endpoints** â†’ Full admin operations
4. **Admin Logout** â†’ Invalidate admin session

## ðŸ› ï¸ Admin Management Operations:
- **Get All Admins** â†’ List all administrators with pagination
- **Get Admin by ID** â†’ Retrieve specific admin details
- **Create Admin** â†’ Add new administrator account
- **Update Admin** â†’ Modify admin account details
- **Delete Admin** â†’ Remove administrator account

## ðŸ’³ Transaction Management:
- **Get All Transactions** â†’ Monitor all user transactions with filtering
- **Reverse Transaction** â†’ Reverse any transaction type with reason
- **Admin Topup User Balance** â†’ Admin can top-up user balance directly
- **Admin Adjust User Balance** â†’ Credit/debit adjustments with reason tracking
- **Admin Set User Balance** â†’ Set exact balance amount with audit trail
- **Get User Balance History** â†’ View detailed balance change history
- **Transaction Analytics** â†’ View transaction trends and statistics

## âš–ï¸ Checker-Maker System (Dual Approval) ðŸ†•:
- **Create Pending Transaction (Maker)** â†’ Submit high-value transactions for approval
  - Supports: topup, withdraw, transfer, balance_adjustment, balance_set
  - Automatic threshold validation based on transaction type and amount
  - Segregation of duties: Maker cannot approve own transactions
- **Get Pending Transactions** â†’ View all transactions awaiting approval
  - Filter by status (pending, approved, rejected, expired)
  - Filter by transaction type, maker admin, target user
  - Pagination support for large datasets
- **Approve Transaction (Checker)** â†’ Approve pending transactions
  - Validates checker is different from maker
  - Automatically executes approved transaction
  - Creates audit trail for approval decision
- **Reject Transaction (Checker)** â†’ Reject pending transactions
  - Requires rejection reason/comments
  - Prevents transaction execution
  - Maintains audit trail for compliance
- **Get Approval Statistics** â†’ View approval system metrics
  - Statistics by transaction type, admin, time period
  - Approval rates, rejection rates, expiration tracking
  - Performance analytics for compliance reporting

## ðŸŽ¯ Approval Threshold Management ðŸ†•:
- **Get All Approval Thresholds** â†’ List all approval thresholds
- **Get Approval Threshold by Type** â†’ Get threshold for specific transaction type
- **Create/Update Approval Threshold** â†’ Configure approval rules
  - Set amount thresholds requiring approval
  - Configure dual approval thresholds for ultra-high values
  - Set auto-expiration timeouts
  - Activate/deactivate thresholds
- **Deactivate Approval Threshold** â†’ Disable threshold rules

## ðŸ›¡ï¸ Security & Compliance Features:
- **Segregation of Duties** â†’ Maker-checker separation enforced
- **Configurable Thresholds** â†’ Based on transaction type and amount
- **Auto-Expiration** â†’ Prevents stale approvals (12-48 hours)
- **Dual Approval** â†’ Ultra-high value transactions require two approvals
- **Comprehensive Audit Trail** â†’ All approval actions logged
- **Risk-Based Controls** â†’ Different thresholds for different risk levels

## ðŸ‘¥ User Management (Admin Only):
- **Get All Users** â†’ List all users with advanced search and filtering
- **Get User by ID** â†’ Retrieve specific user details
- **Admin User Balance Management** â†’ Comprehensive balance operations
  - **Topup** â†’ Add funds to user balance
  - **Adjust** â†’ Credit/debit with reason (positive/negative amounts)
  - **Set Balance** â†’ Set exact balance amount
  - **Balance History** â†’ View all balance-affecting transactions

## âš™ï¸ Configuration Management:
- **Get All Configs** â†’ List all system configuration values
- **Get Config by Key** â†’ Retrieve specific configuration value
- **Set Config** â†’ Create or update configuration values
- **Delete Config** â†’ Remove configuration values
- **Admin Terms & Conditions** â†’ Manage admin-specific terms and conditions
- **Admin Privacy Policy** â†’ Manage admin-specific privacy policy

## ðŸ” Audit & Security Monitoring:
- **Get Audit Logs** â†’ Review all system activities with filtering
  - Filter by entity type (user, transaction, admin, etc.)
  - Filter by action (CREATE, READ, UPDATE, DELETE)
  - Filter by user/admin ID, date range, IP address
  - Pagination support for large datasets
- **Get Login Audit Logs** â†’ Monitor authentication activities
  - Filter by login type (user_login, admin_login, logout)
  - Filter by status (success, failed, blocked)
  - Device information and failure reasons

## ðŸš¨ Security Features:
- JWT Token-based authentication
- Role-based access control
- Comprehensive audit trails
- Failed login monitoring
- IP address tracking
- Device session management
- **Checker-Maker Approval Controls** ðŸ†•
- **Configurable Risk Thresholds** ðŸ†•

## âš ï¸ Important Notes:
- **Admin Token Required** â†’ All endpoints require admin authentication
- **Role Permissions** â†’ Different admin roles may have different permissions
- **Audit Compliance** â†’ All admin actions are logged for security
- **Rate Limiting** â†’ Admin actions may be rate-limited for security
- **Dual Approval** â†’ High-value transactions require checker approval ðŸ†•

## ðŸ”§ Environment Variables Required:
- `base_url` â†’ Server base URL (http://localhost:8080)
- `admin_email` â†’ Admin email for login
- `admin_password` â†’ Admin password for login
- `admin_token` â†’ Admin access token (auto-set after login)
- `admin_id` â†’ Admin ID (auto-set after login)
- `admin_role` â†’ Admin role (auto-set after login)
- `config_key` â†’ Configuration key for config operations
- `config_value` â†’ Configuration value for config operations
- `admin_terms_content` â†’ Admin terms & conditions content
- `admin_privacy_content` â†’ Admin privacy policy content
- `target_user_id` â†’ User ID for admin operations (topup, etc.)
- `topup_amount` â†’ Amount to topup user balance
- `topup_description` â†’ Description for topup transaction
- `adjustment_amount` â†’ Amount for balance adjustment (positive for credit, negative for debit)
- `adjustment_reason` â†’ Reason for balance adjustment (minimum 10 characters)
- `adjustment_type` â†’ Type of adjustment (adjustment, correction, manual_correction, error_correction)
- `adjustment_description` â†’ Optional description for adjustment
- `set_balance_amount` â†’ Target balance amount for set balance operation
- `set_balance_reason` â†’ Reason for setting balance (minimum 10 characters)
- `set_balance_description` â†’ Optional description for set balance operation
- `balance_history_page` â†’ Page number for balance history pagination
- `balance_history_limit` â†’ Items per page for balance history
- `balance_history_type` â†’ Filter balance history by transaction type
- `pending_transaction_id` â†’ ID of pending transaction for approval/rejection ðŸ†•
- `checker_maker_transaction_type` â†’ Type: topup, withdraw, transfer, balance_adjustment, balance_set ðŸ†•
- `checker_maker_amount` â†’ Transaction amount for checker-maker ðŸ†•
- `checker_maker_description` â†’ Description for checker-maker transaction ðŸ†•
- `checker_maker_target_user_id` â†’ Target user ID for checker-maker transaction ðŸ†•
- `approval_comments` â†’ Comments for approval decision ðŸ†•
- `rejection_comments` â†’ Comments for rejection decision ðŸ†•
- `threshold_transaction_type` â†’ Transaction type for threshold management ðŸ†•
- `threshold_amount` â†’ Amount threshold for approval requirement ðŸ†•
- `threshold_requires_dual` â†’ Boolean for dual approval requirement ðŸ†•
- `threshold_dual_amount` â†’ Amount threshold for dual approval ðŸ†•
- `threshold_expire_hours` â†’ Hours until pending transaction expires ðŸ†•
- `target_user_id` â†’ User ID for soft delete operations ðŸ†•
- `deleted_user_id` â†’ ID of deleted user for restore/permanent delete ðŸ†•
- `deleted_admin_id` â†’ ID of deleted admin for restore/permanent delete ðŸ†•
- `deleted_user_page` â†’ Page number for deleted users pagination ðŸ†•
- `deleted_user_per_page` â†’ Items per page for deleted users ðŸ†•
- `deleted_admin_page` â†’ Page number for deleted admins pagination ðŸ†•
- `deleted_admin_per_page` â†’ Items per page for deleted admins ðŸ†•

2. **Dashboard Overview** â†’ View system statistics

5. **Configuration Management** â†’ Manage system settings and content

9. **Transaction Reversal** â†’ Reverse transactions if needed
10. **Audit Review** â†’ Monitor system activities and security
11. **Admin Logout** â†’ Clean session termination
